maqras.text: 56|1|yakhana sanghatita habe kiyamata [1]
56|2|(takhana) etara sanghatana mithya balara ke'u thakabe na [1].
56|3|Eta ka'uke karabe nica, ka'uke karabe samunnata [1]
56|4|yakhana prabala kampane prakampita habe yamina
56|5|ebam curna-bicurna haye parabe parbatamala
56|6|atahpara ta paryabasita habe utksipta dhulikanaya
56|7|ara tomara bibhakta haye parabe tina dale --- [1]
56|8|atahpara dana dikera dala; dana dikera dalati kata saubhagyabana [1]
56|9|ebam bama dikera dala; ara bama dikera dalati kata hatabhaga [1]
56|10|ara agrabartigana'i to agrabarti [1]
56|11|tara'i naikatyapraapta
56|12|ni'amatapurna udyane
56|13|bahu sankhyaka habe purbabartidera madhya theke
56|14|ebam alpa sankhyaka habe parabartidera madhya theke [1].
56|15|Sbarna o dami pathara khacita asane
56|16|tara helana diye basabe, paraspara mukhomukhi haye [1].
56|17|Tadera asepase ghuraphira karabe cira - kisorera [1]
56|18|panapatra, jaga o prasrabana nihsrta surapurna peyala niye [1].
56|19|Se sura pane tadera sirahpira habe na, tara jnanahara'o habe na--- [1]
56|20|Ara (ghoraphera karabe) tadera pachandamata phalamula niye [1]
56|21|ara tadera insita pakhira gosata niye [1].
56|22|Ara tadera jan'ya thakabe dagara caksubisista hura
56|23|yena tara suraksita mukta [1]
56|24|tadera kajera puraskarasbarupa.
56|25|Sekhane tara sunabe na kona asara ba papabakya [1]
56|26|‘salama’ ara ‘salama’ bani chara.
56|27|Ara dana dikera dala, kata bhagyabana dana dikera dala
56|28|tara thakabe emana udyane, yate ache [1] kamtahina kulagacha [2]
56|29|ebam kamdi bhara kala gacha
56|30|ara samprasarita chaya [1]
56|31|ara sada prabahamana pani
56|32|o pracura phalamula
56|33|ya sesa habe na o ya nisid'dha'o habena [1].
56|34|Ara samucca sayyasamuha [1]
56|35|niscaya amara taderake srsti karechi bisesarupe [1]
56|36|atahpara taderake karechi kumari [1]
56|37|sohagini [1] o samabayaska [2]
56|38|danadikera lokadera jan'ya.
56|39|Tadera aneke habe purbabartidera madhya theke
56|40|ebam aneke habe parabartidera madhya theke [1].
56|41|Ara bama dikera dala, kata hatabhagya bamadikera dala
56|42|tara thakabe atyanta usna bayu o uttapta panite
56|43|ara kalobarnera dhumyara chayaya
56|44|ya sitala naya, aramadayaka'o naya.
56|45|Itopurbe tara to magna chila bhoga-bilase
56|46|ara tara abirama lipta chila ghoratara papakaje.
56|47|Ara tara balata, ‘mare asthi o matite parinata hale'o ki amaderake uthano habe
56|48|ebam amadera pitrpurusara'o?’
56|49|Baluna, ‘abasya'i purbabartira o parabartira
56|50|saba'ike ekatra kara habe eka nirdharita dinera nirdista samaye.
56|51|Tarapara he bibhranta mithyaropakarira
56|52|tara abasya'i ahara karabe yakkuma gacha theke
56|53|atahpara seta dbara tara peta purna karabe
56|54|tadupari tara pana karabe tara upara ati usna pani
56|55|atahpara pana karabe trsnarta utera n'yaya.
56|56|Pratidana dibase eta'i habe tadera apyayana.
56|57|Amara'i [1] tomaderake srsti karechi, tabe kena tomara bisbasa karacha na
56|58|tomara ki bhebe dekhecha tomadera biryapata sambandhe
56|59|Seta ki tomara srsti kara, na amara srsti kari [1]
56|60|amara tomadera madhye mrtyu nirdharita karechi [1] ebam amaderake aksama kara yabe na
56|61|tomadera sthale tomadera sadrsa anayana karate ebam tomaderake emana eka akrtite srsti karate ya tomara jana na [1].
56|62|Ara abasya'i tomara abagata hayecha prathama srsti samparke, tabe tomara upadesa grahana kara na kena [1]
56|63|tomara ye bija bapana kara se samparke cinta karecha ki [1]
56|64|tomara ki setake ankurita kara, na amara ankurita kari
56|65|amara icche karale etake khara-kutoya parinata karate pari, takhana hatabud'dhi haye parabe tomara
56|66|(e'i bale) ‘niscaya amara dayagrasta haye parechi,’
56|67|baram ‘amara hrta-sarbasba haye parechi.’
56|68|Tomara ye pani pana kara ta samparke amake jana'o [1]
56|69|tomara ki seta megha hate namiye ana, na amara seta barsana kari
56|70|amara icche karale ta labanakta kare dite pari. Tabu'o kena tomara krtajnata prakasa kara na
56|71|tomara ye aguna prajbalita kara se byapare amake bala
56|72|tomara'i ki era gacha srsti kara, na amara srsti kari
56|73|amara etake karechi smaraka [1] ebam marucaridera prayojaniya bastu [2].
56|74|Kaje'i apani apanara mahana rabera namera pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna [1].
